name: WordBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Word Buddy what is the plural of tooth?”
”What do you call more than one tooth?”
”What do you call a group of penguins?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word buddy
des:
Word Buddy helps kids learn the plural form of words and the group name for animals.

Simply start Word Buddy and ask it: what do you call more than one tooth? Or what is the plural of fox?

If you want to know the name of animal group, ask Word Buddy: what do you call a group of ducks (or other animal)?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
